overview: One beautiful autumn night, fireflies, bees, praying mantises, butterflies, frogs, small fish, shrimps, etc. gathered together for a singing and dancing party. The curtain opened, the fireflies gave off colorful lights, and the textile girl and Jin Lingzi played nice music. After the show, the main character, the big swallowtail, snatched away all the flowers presented by the red dragonfly.
title: Singing and Dancing on the Lake
